mutants.original_line: odd_sum = 0
mutants.code:
def sum_and_average_odd_elements(lst):
    odd_sum = 1
    odd_count = 0
    for num in lst:
        odd_sum += num * (num & 1)
        odd_count += num & 1
    average = odd_sum / odd_count if odd_count != 0 else 0
    return average
